content: An M1 Abrams tank weighs approximately 68-72 tons, depending on the variant. The cost of an M1 Abrams tank can vary depending on factors such as the configuration and production year, but as of 2021 the unit cost for a single M1A2 SEPv3 Abrams tank is around $8.5 million. The lifetime cost of operating and maintaining an M1 Abrams tank can vary depending on factors such as the usage and deployment of the tank, but some estimates put it at around $17 million to $18 million per tank over a 30-year lifespan.
